QuestData.Title: Regroup!
QuestData.Description: They have an airbase! I have underestimated this Alliance Captain for the last time. So many good warriors lost...$b$bThere must have been a few survivors who were able to bail during the crash. We need every able-bodied fighter we can get.$b$bFind as many survivors as you can in the forest below, and I will investigate the wreckage itself. Rally everyone together at the nearby village for a counter-attack.
QuestData.LogDescription: Rescue Shademaster Kiryn, Rivett Clutchpop, Shokia, and Sergeant Gorrok from Honeydew Glade.
